title: I'm a singer, but I don't have a band. I would like to have one. How can I get a band to be in? - Quora

response.answer_text: Start posting about what you want to do on all platforms of social media! In this day and age, we are gifted with the power of using the internet to make things like this a lot easier. Make posts on your blog, facebook, twitter, etc. saying what specific bands the music you like to sing sounds like, and what types of people you are looking for (drummer or bassist, experience or no experience, what agre, etc!). Also, make an effort to learn more about the local music scene in your area. Are there many local bands from around you? If so, try to go to as many of their concerts as you can in order to support them. Over time, you may become a known fan to them, and even get to know some members of the bands, who will more likely than not have connections to people who are looking for the exact same thing as you are.

If you are from india, following things might help you...Indian music more often known for its 2 different flavors of music (souther and northern). Both incorporates mainstream rock music.Now in India, we have huge number of bands to which you can join them initially (if you get chance).once you join established band it will be very easy to start up new band of your own in later stages.Or if you have good network of vocalists and instrumental players within your circle, you guys all together can form a band and need to showcase yourself without loosing "small" or big opportunities.** Its all about your passion towards music.** committed to form a band and need to be very patient enough to form a band of your dreamas competition is too high for music now a days. But yes, if you have these 2 band will be yours :)
